website_summaries.verdict: The Skullcandy Uproar Wireless Bluetooth headphones deliver some serious bass response for a very reasonable price.
cons: No 3.5mm audio cable for passive, wired listening
Can be easy to accidentally power down

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Im no stranger to quality expensive headphones currently owning audio-technica mx-50's around £130-150 which are fantastic,so buying these for the kids i was trully shocked with the quality and separation of the sound.absolute bargain,bought another pair the next day.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very happy overall
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight headphones, surprisingly light I would say! Instant Bluetooth connection and very good sound quality to say the ear cushions don't cover your hears but are just against them...overall not the best skullcandy headphones I've bought but I'd recommend for the price especially if your not looking for a big chunky pair!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty light considering other models I tried which is a ...
customer_reviews.text: They're alright considering the price but don't expect something that's going to blow you away. The battery life is decent but I couldn't get more than 4 hours out of them. They are pretty light considering other models I tried which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: MMCh

customer_reviews.title: These are not bad for budget Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are not bad for budget Bluetooth headphones. They are both bass heavy & treble heavy which can be sorted to a degree with your equalizer settings. For £25, there aren't many Bluetooth sets that match the style of these though. Sound quality - 3/5 Comfort - 4/5 Battery life - 5/5 Style - 5/5 Ease of use - 5/5
customer_reviews.author: BCFCBristolRed

customer_reviews.title: Great value entry level branded bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some entry level headphones and these have just arrived - immediate impressions are very good. Comfortable fit, lightweight and easy to pair to my iPhone 7. Using them to listen to my fitness music for learning routines to group exercise and they fit the bill. Bass is good, treble and mid range fine although distortion becomes obvious at higher volumes - but for £30 you really can't find anything wrong in that. Highly recommended for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of tangling myself up when I listened to music on my phone - having owned a Skullcandy Shrapnel for a while, I thought I'd give these a whirl. So happy I did! Very comfortable, excellent sound quality and a great range.
customer_reviews.author: Rowenna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I can not stress enough how good these are. They are so lightweight, very comfortable and fantastic sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: ann godwin

customer_reviews.title: Mixed views
customer_reviews.text: I have Skull Candy Hesh 2 (wired). I like those headphones as they are great for instruments and vocals. I like clarity. I wanted Bluetooth headset, but wanted similar Hesh 2, but lighter version for going and about and for exercise. The sound quality is weak if love instruments and vocals. A lot headphones are tuned differently, may be for bass lovers but this headphones was n't for me. I do have SkullCandy LowRider (wired) for going out and about it does a reasonable job, but I foudn the wire restrictive when exercising. Before lockdown, I tried a number of Bluetooth headphones, which many just were n't up to standard. Still undecided about returning or keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Yipee!

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones soooooo comfortable Q
customer_reviews.text: For the price very hard to beat I think The key for me was the comfort over time I suffer from Tinitus so other headphones either sweat my ears or the constant over pressure makes it uncomfortable These are perfect for audio books or TV well done
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for the price you don't wear them you immerse yourselves in them. I've never been a fan of Bluetooth as a good form of transport for music but these little cans have me converted with Come Together from the Beatles, they just handle the bass so beautifully that you forget these things cost less than some in ear rubbish that doesn't know what base is. Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Simon6467

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great...let down by faulty buttons/controls.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, nice base which I like. Only 2 stars though as within 2 weeks of purchase the control buttons on the headphones had stopped working and I’ve left it too late to return them. I can’t skip a track or adjust volume, and considering I bought these to use in the gym with my phone in my pocket/left on the side, it’s now defeated the object...I still have to get my phone out or go back to it to control the music I’m listening to. If the controls hadn’t broken, I’d have given these 5 stars as the range is good for clear connectivity too....gutted.
customer_reviews.author: H.S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality audio for the price, but not loud enough & noise cancelling not great.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Great connectivity, the range is really good should you wear them in doors. - Sound quality, even though they're not the tightest fit, you get a good range including good bass response Cons: - They don't particularly cancel out noise, and if it's windy then you're going to be disappointed - The Grey/White ones don't look as cool as they do in the photo. The grey/black ones do Overall: For the price, these really are excellent. I've got Sennheisers and Allen & Heaths here for DJing and monitoring. I'm not disappointed when I put the Skull Candy ones on, again, especially for the price. RECOMMEND (Paul, not Jenny Madley)
customer_reviews.author: Miss J M Madley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good sound
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my iPad and they are great. I can be quite a distance away and there are no problems with keeping the connection. They don't block out all other sound but that isn't a problem for me. Apparently they don't 'leak' sound because my husband can't hear anything when I use them, so they would be good for use on public transport. Delivery was speedy and they are comfortable. Others have commented on the battery life but I have found the battery to last very well - I'd estimate about 7 hours use before they needed a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Judith H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Got these to wear while out running as the in ear ones kept falling out. They are comfy and sound quality good, they don’t go as loud as I’d want and it would be good if they folded but overall I’m pleased with them for going jogging. Battery life good, had them for 3 weeks and not needed charging. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: zoggaz

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful sound, but too painful to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these headphones as they were excruciatingly tight and painful to wear from the moment you put them on. It's a shame, as the sound seemed fantastic and they were very easy to operate and looked well made too. They're an exceptionally tight fit, however, and anybody who has medical issues with their ears (as I do) would do well to try a lighter, "open" design that won't press so much on your ears. A lovely sound, just not suitable for me, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Lep

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I used to avoid Skullcandy as a brand because many of their designs look a bit 'kiddy'. Needed a cheapish pair of Bluetooth headphones to wear outdoors so decided to give these all-black ones a go. The Skullcandy Uproar headphones offer good sound quality, are comfortable enough for an hour or two, and have a decent battery life. They don't compare to, say, Bose noise-cancelling ones, but they're also 10x cheaper, so they very much do the job.
customer_reviews.author: T Y

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family have a pair of uproar skull candy wireless headphones and we love them. Bluetooth connection goes a long way. Battery lasts a long long time. Perfect sound quality. Answers calls handsfree. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Good but not flawless
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones at first but after only a few weeks it was slow to connect to my phone and the sound is very quiet. I used to be able to have the sound really low on my phone but quite high through the speakers of the headphones but now i have to turn my phone volume on full to get that sound. Sometimes there's a delay when I'm not listening to music but maybe playing a game. It's a good product but it's certainly not flawless.
customer_reviews.author: michael o'connor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For £29
customer_reviews.text: I paid £29 for these headphones, and I couldn't be happier. At that price point, this is the best pair of Bluetooth on-ears that one could get as far as I am aware. They're comfortable, light, and compact and they look pretty good, and their sound is good - high quality sound for most consumers, with Skullcandy's typical emphasis on bass. If you enjoy the feel and sound of the bass in your music, these headphones are excellent. That said, the value proposition might be very different at £50 - so I would advise doing a lot of research before paying full price for these.
customer_reviews.author: E. W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to use when gaming. He was a bit sceptical at first, as it's not a brand he has used before, but after giving them a thorough trial, decided he really liked them. He now wears them for gaming, listening to podcasts and making phone calls. Good battery life and decent sound quality. Excellent value for money. My dad tried them out and has now bought himself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Smart and easy use
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of headphones. I’ve got a lot of brand loyalty to Skullcandy, however I’ve had a bit of bad luck with corded headphones. Decided to try these for a change, and they’re great. I use them for walking to work and even jogging, and the sound quality is very good. There’s no interference and the volume can be controlled using the on-set buttons. Charging and pairing is simple, and I’d highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good
customer_reviews.text: For the price good. Comfortable on ear and sound quality is ok up to a point. The emphasis seems to be on base and therefore a noticeable lack of high frequency, Volume control works ok and after a charge the inbuilt battery life is good. Overall verdict is, we can pay a lot of money for high quality head phones, but for the price, these give a reasonable output. I am quite pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: TerryC

customer_reviews.title: cheap and rather cheerful
customer_reviews.text: well they worked fine out of the box, instructions are quite poor but adequate, typical of the modern age where most of the content is aimed at covering as many languages as possible rather than operation. I am a large man, as in over six feet and then a chunk, and I find these comfortable. The sound quality is good, not reference but for less than thirty quid very good, although I personally would prefer more top end, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Big Nose

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm of an age where modern products are looking flimsy. These headphones were bought as part of wifes birthday present and she loves them. Bluetooth connected to her phone and laptop easily and even my daughters picky iphone locked onto them. Sound is good and for the money i would call them good value. Daughter also copped a pair from me in grey and she loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Aleppo

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality headphones but it loosens up after a while
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones for it's value. Surprisingly good audio quality and strikingly good battery life. Only problem I had is that after a while the fitting of headphones loosen up and it just slides off. It's annoying when you want to keep it on for longer calls or to listen to music after long time. Another problem is sweat. When I am walking or doing some household work while listening to music or talking to someone on phone, it gets really sweaty and again comes off again and again. However, except these two problems it's a really great value for money headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_1

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy - Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Comfortable for the gym and stay in place when running. Good battery life. Brilliant sound - can't even hear the gym music when I'm playing mine via Bluetooth from iPhone. Tested them in the house and still connects when I went into the other room.
customer_reviews.author: Heart Ocean Secrets Blogspot

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic battery life. Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good at this price point. Battery life is much better than I thought it could possibly be. My wife is very happy with these headphones and so am I as I don’t have to listen to her music anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Nigel B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! I’ve had them for just over a year and I have bought some for family and friends too! Brilliant for the gym when you don’t want the wires tailing. I bought because I normally have ear ache from wearing in-ear headphones for long periods. These are unbelievably comfortable and the sound quality is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Material feel is good, fits very well to my head though my ...
customer_reviews.text: Material feel is good, fits very well to my head though my head is very big. It fits very well. Charges very fast, and hold battery power for around 10-14 hours with music. Buttons feels is very good and easy to use. Con ets with Bluetooth very easily. Once setup it auto detects for next time. So all in all very good product.
customer_reviews.author: sai

customer_reviews.title: Durable but a tad bit flawed
customer_reviews.text: The background static is unbearable when it's used in a quite setting or on a low volume from day one. Otherwise it's durable and has lasted a fair few bumps and rainy days. Audio quality apart from the static is pretty good. Issue with the middle bottom though, it is simultaneously the pause/play button, the answer/drop call button, speed dial and power button. So I've had a few times where I went to play but ended up calling someone like my mam at 2am in the morning. I don't talk to my mam during the day so ringing her at 2am isn't my ideal way of catching up.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Licayan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and Bluetooth works well with iPhone. Connection with MacBook struggles sometimes but unsure if it's an error with the headphones or laptop. Comfortable fit although could be slightly bigger to go round the head. Stylish and slick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an established brand.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are excellent for my 4.5 year old son. The sound quality is excellent and they are very comfortable. The on ear design is a little different to over ear and took a little time to get used to, but they are very snug and comfortable without being too tight. They feel very hard wearing, which they need to be for him. Connection is very easy and stable. Working range is approximately 10 metres. Battery life is fantastic. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze Falconburger

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son aged 12 and he loves them. He uses these with his ipad rather than listening to music on the go. He uses these for 1 or 2 hours daily and has only changed them 3 times since Christmas. Sound is fine from what I hear when I borrow these. Great price for what seems to be a great product. Just order myself a pair for the gym and when sitting at my desk at work. No more wires getting in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones but..
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to replace a pair if neckband type headphones as they hurt my ears after a while, unfortunately these do the same ! However the sound quality is far better but with hindsight I should have gone for an over ear pair for better comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and extremely comfortable to wear. I bought these in order to wind down for bed, listening to soothing music and stories. They were exactly what I was hoping for. I forget that I’m even wearing them. Would highly recommend if you are looking for an affordable pair of wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Maskell

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Remarkably good value for money. These headphones are very comfortable and lightweight. Construction is simple yet elegant. Not for the hi-fi buff, but perfect for everyday listening. Bass is a little on the heavy side but not offensively so.
customer_reviews.author: Noncom

customer_reviews.title: Honestly good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Honestly really shocked! I like these. I was so hesitant buying headphones on amazon but these are comfy, great sound and they actually stay on while running. If they break, I’ll update my review. But first time using them, no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Saheeda

customer_reviews.title: Very good, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation is effective when something is playing through them, the sound quality is brilliant very happy with that and comfort is so so, longer periods pressing in your ears can ache, shorter ones, perfectly fine. Very happy, love Skullcandy, 100% recommend and value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: but have got progressively worse. After wearing them twice they moulded to the ...
customer_reviews.text: These started out okay for the first couple of times, but have got progressively worse. After wearing them twice they moulded to the shape of my head, I am not sure if they are meant to do this but now I feel like they could snap at any point, and makes it so uncomfortable for anyone else to wear. Not that anyone can even use them now as they wont even connect to my phone which is extremely frustrating when at the gym, and even when they did work they cut out all the time. I wouldn't mind so much if this was after a year or so but I have only worn them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Although both headphones reach my ears easily they sit at a funny angle as the band ...
customer_reviews.text: Clearly only designed for people with a small head. Although both headphones reach my ears easily they sit at a funny angle as the band design is such that it doesn’t sit correctly on my head. Actually head phone cans are smaller than expected too. Good sound quality though and you can be quite a distance from your device without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and very easy to use. Sound quality isn't great, my cheap in ear phones give a deeper sound, but that not bad if you can adjust the bass on your device. Worth the money given that they're wireless and so user friendly, but in hindsight I personally would have invested more in a better pair.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandson (15) who thinks they are first rate - really pleased with the noise cancellation and the quality of sound. Not too heavy and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Book fiend

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a second pair of on ear headphones. Sound compares very favourably with my more expensive set. Also very comfortable and lightweight. Good value purchase that exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: D J Avis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent while it lasted!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these budget headphones that I have used almost daily since January 2018. Unfortunately not built to last: my on/off button doesn't work anymore so whilst they are still useable, I have to charge all the time as they won't turn off. I'm assuming as I've had them for almost 2 years that they are out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Denyer

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones, good sound quality. Only complaint that they crush my ears after a while (I wear for 6+ hours a day at work). Battery life is quite good, only need to charge every few days, good considering they get 6+ hours of use a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned a pair of headphones like this and after asking numerous friends they recommended SkullCandy and I’m not disappointed. They have great sound quality and very easy to work. Bluetooth connects instantly! The noise cancellation quality is ok but for the price you really can’t complain!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: The sound is nothing special and after having these for a month, I’m finding the sound drops out every few seconds at times as though the Bluetooth connection is faulty. Only decent thing was the battery life!! Sadly just missed the returns cut off.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Good for music, really crap phone call quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for listening music when paired with a smart phone or tablet. But that's it. I wanted to buy it for a hands-free conference call use. But the bluetooth quality after pairing with smart devices for this headset is pretty crap. I tried many methods to pair it with my laptop, but in the end i found out that it's protocol isnt supported with laptops and PCs directly. So, it's been lying around gathering dust...
customer_reviews.author: ymk

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay, the overall quality is very good. PROS: excellent battery life, I charge them once weekly with every day use, better battery life than many known brands. Good sound quality. Sturdy and durable. CONS: Not so much noise cancellation. Bluetooth connection is often times cutting out and the range of signal is not that big.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Good sound, don’t move when running. Haven’t used them outside just on the treadmill so can’t comment on outside noise but I need to hear any traffic approaching as I live in a rural area
customer_reviews.author: L. Cockburn

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Has been great so far. Sounds good. Battery life is good if you use it 1-2 hours a day like me. Dropped it a few times there are no scratches and it hasnt broken yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: If you want some decent quality wireless headphones then these are a must for you. Would definitely recommend especially for under £20
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones and great price
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones around. Sound quality fantastic and easy to connect. Bought 2 sets for teens and they love m. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Durable enough for little kids too
customer_reviews.text: Using with a child with significant hearing impairment, brain damage and autism. They are a good fit, comfortable and he loveds them. Bought a second pair for a 2 and a half year old.
customer_reviews.author: HMG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheap gym headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great - occasionally get turned on in the gym bag as the buttons are quite a soft touch, but can’t really complain for the money. Not much isolation, but they last forever. And I mean weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Insanity

customer_reviews.title: great for the money
customer_reviews.text: pretty good sound for the money ,bluetooth works fine ,easy buttons for the volume control as you can feel the obvious plus and minus buttons at the side ,the head band seem to stick out quite a lot at the side maybe thats cos I have shaved head tho
customer_reviews.author: c barnes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - do purchase!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent pair of earphones. It was a replacement for my damaged Skull Candy earphones. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: I. Deshmukh

customer_reviews.title: Cracking value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are very good. Decent sound quality, easy connection, good battery life & comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barrie

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Found them uncomfortable. I thought the sound would be good if there was any noise isolation whatsoever. Not particularly portable as they're not foldable. However, they are light and no connectivity issues So if they fit your head by some miracle they're a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Kishan

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears
customer_reviews.text: Very good audio quality with high noise cancelling effect with a long battery life and I was happily surprised to find out the headphones are very light weight. The blue tooth connectivity is always constant and overall I am really happy with this purchase as I feel it was good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie black

customer_reviews.title: great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfortable, lightweight,easy to connect up and good battery life.. great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Tricky

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a second pair of headphones to use in the gym. Sound quality is average but ok for the price. They're comfortable to wear and I've had no problems whatsoever with the Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: i am pleased to say these are amazing still going strong would ...
customer_reviews.text: After my son age 8 having 3 other headphones from Amazon all of which were returned as they broke after 3 months, i am pleased to say these are amazing still going strong would recommend for children and teenagers
customer_reviews.author: Justine Perry

customer_reviews.title: 1 year on and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I have had these for nearly a year now and have used them nearly everyday on my commute and whilst running with no breakdown in performance or any other issues. I find earphones really uncomfortable so these have replaced those entirely. The battery life is good, the fit is snug and comfortable without being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: AAD

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headphone for its price
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth headphone for its price. Good Bluetooth connectivity with your device, (works well with iPhone and Apple MacBook). Good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Really good for bass
customer_reviews.text: I really love a good bass in a song and when these headphones multiply that bass it's fantastic. It is unfortunate that it's only a bluetooth speaker as that eats up the battery on my phone quickly so I can't use it if I'm going on long journeys and I won't be able to charge my phone soon. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Moh

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable and not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality isn’t the greatest, and neither is the comfort of wearing them. The plastic doesn’t make them very comfortable and makes them feel quite cheap. They also don’t look the best (not that this is a priority). The only positive for me was that you can check the amount of battery life left next to the Bluetooth icon on your phone (Apple)
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Used since purchased. Exactly the size and style I wanted. Volume high when needed and cancels any background noise and is quite comfortable generally, However does become uncomfortable when wearing it for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Great wee set
customer_reviews.text: Great wee set of headphones. For my 12yr daughter to use with her phone. Couldn’t fault them.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz01

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones, excellent sound quality for this price range. Bluetooth works nicely. very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for mother, she’s very pleased she uses these for audio books.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent and bluetooth easy to set up. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Pete

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for wireless headphones which have both a decent sound and reasonable price, and finally I think I've found them! I've been very impressed with the sound. They paired easily with both my phone (samsung) and watch (samsung gear s3). Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: WaveyDavey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Budget Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bluetooth headphones that are nice sounding, good value and easy to pair. Others I've tried have issues pairing or audio delay, but these don't at all. This is my second pair, they work brilliantly with the Fire TV.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not charging
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use at the gym and running, they have been a decent investment however after 6 months the headphones have stopped charging
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! For the price they sound great, they’re lightweight and easy to carry and they are very comfortable to wear. I was worried about the battery life as I need them for full study days at university but the battery lasts me about three days! A must buy at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Worst pair I've tried
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with these headphones; they look and feel cheap, the sound quality is terrible and hollow, it amplifies external sounds, and they gave me a headache from being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Buttons broke in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed 2 pairs broke the same problem with both.... I was so hopeful about these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really good helmet. The sound is good and the delay is low. The autonomy is really impressive. And a last point you Can call ans thé quality is very good
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Monserrat

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Good standard headphones. Bluetooth works well when tried, good range. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: The Smith™

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym. They stay put when I’m on the treadmill. I think they look nice and don’t swamp my head. Sound is fine, can’t hear the gyms music over the top of mine. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really not a very powerful sound. I'm not one for heavy bass but these just don't deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Poole

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: These head phones are little crackers! For the price you pay the sound quality is outstanding. So so comfortable and the look of the product is 10 / 10. The box is naff but hey im being picky! Linked up to my ipad 3 they rock. Buy these. You'll love them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great buy.. my son loves them. Easy to connect to mobile and tablet. Had to get a connector to use with ps4
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good set of headphones there the second set we’ve bought and sound great and clear
customer_reviews.author: Leah D.

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: bought these as a xmas gift for my son, as have purchased numerous skullcandy products and never had any problems with them. He is impressed with the headset, it is comfortable, easy to connect and good sound quality. Would definitely recommend and purchase product again .
customer_reviews.author: ms karen e allinson

customer_reviews.title: favor headset
customer_reviews.text: got it a few years back and it is still working fine. it might be small in size for other people. but it is prefert for people who have small head like me
customer_reviews.author: joyce yap

customer_reviews.title: Great 🎧 can't fault
customer_reviews.text: Brought for wife who loves them uses them constantly, good build quality and durability. Good sound quality can't fault. Only reason not five stars is she won't let borrow them because she likes them to much.
customer_reviews.author: j f k tanner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had it over a year and love it. Use it for gym and watching movies. Prefer to my old beats by Dre.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones lasted less than a year before they stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones lasted less than a year before they stopped working. Bluetooth connects and then as soon as you start a song disconnects. Both earpieces are also cracking badly as soon as you turn them on and sound, when you does play for the brief period is distorted. Should be under 12 months warranty but don't know how to return them through Amazon Prime?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Allen

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My first bluetooth headphones. Very happy with them. Get around 10 hours before charge (1 hr). Very comfortable. For the price. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: CaomhB

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely be recommending
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, we have 3 of these now. You get quality for your money. True genuine advertising of the product
customer_reviews.author: Chd

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gym and nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones with easy to use controls. There is foam under the headband so it sits on top of the head comfortably. The ear pads are also padded and sit nicely on top of my ears. The sound is brilliant with a deep bass. I've used them for sports and they hold in place nicely as the headband is nice and tight. A good set of headphones for under £30!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for people with hearing difficulty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Mother aged 85 who has severe deafness . She couldn't believe how clear the sound was without any background noise. She said that they are the best headphones she has ever had ! Previously paying over £100 for other sets ! These are her number 1 choice !
customer_reviews.author: Dendavo

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say these headphones are noise cancelling at all. However, they definitely dull the noise from the outside world! They are comfy and hold their charge for a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: LanerLaner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to use great quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money sounds great really easy to set up and pair can’t fault it and would recommend thank you
customer_reviews.author: VALB

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Theses are great. Easy the connect to my mobile, good sound quality and comfortable. I like the control buttons on the right earphone and the overall style is discreet and tasteful.
customer_reviews.author: HellBellMell

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality headphones with excellent audio
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality headphones with excellent audio, however would only connect to my iPhone, and not my android tablet or Dell / windows PC which was disappointing (consequently returned as a result of this as skullcandy website didn't offer driver downloads to correct the problem)
customer_reviews.author: Ross Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Bargain wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for money and very reliable. I use them for running and in the gym and they've performed perfectly every time I've used them. Cant recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkshire Beef

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, long battery life, light and should prove to be fairly durable
customer_reviews.author: Dulwichdik

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Uproar Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black/GreySkullcandy Uproar Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones - Black.

BOX CONTAINS


1 x Uproar wireless headphones, micro USB to USB charging cable
feature_bullets: Bluetooth functionality keeps you connected to your device for up to 33 feet
Sound delivers attacking bass, natural vocals and precision highs
Synthetic leather ear pillows deliver comfort for all day wear
10 hours battery life keeps your audio going non-stop, recharge with provided micro USB cable
On-board mic/remote allows you to take calls and manage your music directly from the ear cup
Impedence is 32 ohms. Frequency Response is 20 Hertz to 20 kilohertz

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
